moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6: Philidor's defense. I don't like it because it blocks in your DSB.
moves.6. Nc3 Nb4: Maybe not the best. Doesn't really accomplish anything that I can see, and you're not supposed to move the same piece twice in the opening without a good reason.
moves.9. Ng5: Probably wasn't a great move. The attack on f7 is too obvious.
moves.10... Bh5 11. g4: I used to do this a lot. Now I don't think it's very good
Argh! Now I blunder away a knight.
moves.19... Rxh3 20. Kg2: I don't like having the rook there
moves.20... Qxg4+ 21. Kf2 Rxh2+: At this point the game is lost for white.
